decision_conditions: <p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">The use shall not commence until the door between the bin storage and the residential lobby is fitted with a self-closing mechanism and a security lock that is usable only by future residents. These shall be maintained in an operational condition for the lifetime of the development, unless otherwise agreed in writing with the Local Planning Authority.</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-d6b813f7-7fff-6aaf-f0bd-f0b95ad7d1d0"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;text-align: justify;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:12pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that the shared bin store does not provide a route for non-residential users of the building into the residential lobby.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:12pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">The use shall not commence until all external doors and windows associated with the D1 use hereby approved have been fitted with self-closing devices, which shall be maintained in an operational condition and at no time shall any external door or windows be fixed in an open position when group prayers are conducted or amplified music is played.</span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 11pt; white-space: pre-wrap;">&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-2c75a6f9-7fff-f588-4c30-4ac89990c5d7"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:12pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON:&nbsp; To ensure that the amenity of occupiers surrounding the buildings when they are in use are not adversely affected by noise break out.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">A scheme of sound insulation designed to prevent the transmission of excessive airborne noise between the proposed commercial and residential use of the building shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Environmental Protection Team. The airborne sound insulation performance shall achieve as a minimum a 10 dB increase in the minimum requirements of Approved Document E of the Building Regulations. The sound insulation shall be installed and maintained only in accordance with the details so approved. Before commencement of the use hereby permitted a test shall be carried out prior to the discharge of this condition to show the standard of sound insulation required shall be met and the results submitted to the Environmental Protection Team for approval.</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-3c287a54-7fff-9829-477a-c0876fd5348d"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:12pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that occupiers of the neighbouring and proposed residential premises do not suffer a loss of amenity by reason of noise.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">The development will contain 14 residential units, as shown on the drawings hereby approved.</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-de771833-7fff-648b-8f01-e095f7db011f"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: In order to define the planning permission.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Noise levels from the proposed fixed plant hereby approved in the rear garden shall be 5db(A) or more below the background noise level when measured at the fa√ßade of any nearby residential property.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-05ce950e-7fff-053d-3817-e5409e7c7c15"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that occupiers of the neighbouring premises do not suffer a loss of amenity by reason of noise nuisance from fixed plant and machinery.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">No panelised brick slip systems requiring vertical or horizontal expansion joints shall be used on any of the building facades.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-21fb851b-7fff-a65b-399d-4003970587d5"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that the external appearance of the building is satisfactory and does not detract from the character and visual amenity of the area.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">The proposed D1 space shall be built out to practical completion prior to the occupation of the proposed residential units.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-8c72a0f6-7fff-4e9f-b752-8958d94d35f3"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: In the interests of securing the community facility and public benefits of this aspect of the proposed development.</span></p>

<div><span id="docs-internal-guid-14de4e1f-7fff-eacb-db79-cad552c3f84a"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">The housing mix of the development hereby approved shall be 8 x 2 bed and 6 x 3 bed flats, unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local planning authority.&nbsp;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure the housing mix is acceptable.</span></p><div><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span></div></span></div>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">No satellite antenna, apparatus or plant of any sort (including structures or plant in connection with the use of telecommunication systems or any electronic communications apparatus) shall be erected on the site or roof hereby approved unless or until details of their size and location have previously been submitted to, for approval in writing by the Local Planning Authority.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-246141ad-7fff-8949-8af0-aeaa2e575975"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure a satisfactory standard of external appearance and to protect local amenity.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">No new plumbing, pipes, soil stacks, flues, vents, grilles, security alarms or ductwork shall be fixed on the external faces of the building unless as otherwise shown on the drawings hereby approved.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-c8c01cc1-7fff-b66a-30b6-68b4819c2a0e"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that the external appearance of the building is satisfactory and does not detract from the character and visual amenity of the area.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">No externally fixed roller shutters shall be installed to the building hereby approved, unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-24eaa6b7-7fff-e7b4-4b1c-23c1bbb14052"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that the external appearance of the building is satisfactory and does not detract from the character and visual amenity of the area.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">The development shall provide level access from the public realm to the permitted D1 space.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-44b50c9e-7fff-8ee0-fead-e8a3c1f325ce"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: In the interest of good accessibility for all users</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Except on days of collection, all refuse and waste shall be stored in sealed containers in the refuse area shown on the plans hereby approved.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-6860db07-7fff-fcbd-bdb8-c3016c5eed0d"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To safeguard the character and appearance of the area and in the interests of neighbouring amenity and highway safety.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Two of the proposed residential units shall be built to meet building regulations Part M4 (3), and the remaining shall be built to meet building regulations PartM4 (2). In the interests of housing choice, the two Part M4 (3) units shall not be of the same bedroom and person size.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-a40a3b75-7fff-78c8-8b75-17a992585bc0"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure the standard of accommodation is acceptable.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">As shown on the approved drawings the lower panes of the windows and balcony screens serving the rear elevation facing the residential units on Overlea Road shall be fitted out with obscure glazing and sealed shut. These details shall be maintained permanently for the lifetime of the development.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-8266deaa-7fff-1cf1-3f93-88cd9830daed"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To protect the visual privacy of the occupiers of the houses to the rear of the site.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">In the event that contamination is found at any time when carrying out the approved development that has not been previously identified it must be reported in writing within 7 days to the Local Planning Authority and once the Local Planning Authority has identified the part of the site affected by the unexpected contamination development must be halted on that part of the site. An assessment must be undertaken in accordance with the</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">requirements of the site investigation, and where remediation is necessary, a remediation scheme, together with a timetable for its implementation, must be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority in accordance with the requirements of the approved remediation scheme. The measures in the approved remediation scheme must then be implemented in accordance with the approved timetable. Following completion of measures identified in the approved remediation scheme a validation report must be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority; and upon such approval development on site may recommence.&nbsp;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To protect the end user(s) of the development, any adjacent land user(s) and the </span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 11pt; white-space: pre-wrap;">environment from contamination.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">No vegetation at the site shall be cleared during the bird nesting season (March to September) unless under the supervision of a suitably qualified ornithologist and no nesting birds or their nests shall be disturbed.</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-5eacba94-7fff-49fb-165f-7ec9c80e3aef"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To safeguard any nesting birds and to comply with the Wildlife and Countryside Act 1981.&nbsp;</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Prior to occupation, a Parking, Design and Management Plan shall be submitted which should include blue badge car parking provision and indicating how the blue badge car parking will be designed and managed, with reference to Transport for London guidance on car parking management and car parking design and the results of the intrusive root survey for the adjacent TPO tree.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-5e3c1593-7fff-ed2d-c0b8-55b7984464b4"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To promote acceptable management of vehicle parking in association with the development.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">The D1 space at Ground and Lower Ground Floor hereby permitted shall be used as an adult study centre and for no other purpose within Use Class D1 of the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes Order) 1987, as amended, or in any provision equivalent to that Class in any statutory instrument revoking and reenacting that Order. The development hereby permitted shall not be used as a school.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-47211935-7fff-6d82-5a42-231902ffd55d"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that the space is operated in a satisfactory manner, does not unduly disturb adjoining occupiers, prejudice local amenity generally as assessed in granting permission.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Prior to occupation green / biodiverse roofs shall be installed in full accordance with details approved as part of application 2020/2248 dated 28/08/20 and shall be retained and maintained in this condition thereafter.</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-dd7552d6-7fff-f8c5-daed-1dc4b0c3d7b6"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To enhance the character and ecology of the development, to provide undisturbed refuges for wildlife, to promote sustainable urban drainage, and to enhance the performance and efficiency of the proposed building.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Prior to the occupation of the development the applicant is to submit the following information and certification with regards to installation to the Local Planning Authority for Approval in writing:&nbsp;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">a) PV system with an efficiency of at least 19.4% and with an installed area of 62.2m2&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-528e7ec5-7fff-8dea-3c33-64e8801adf27"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that the proposed sustainability measures are implemented to a satisfactory standard as proposed.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Prior to the occupation of the development, detailed plans and specifications of the all extract ventilation systems, which shall include details of: external appearance (to show that the flue terminates at least 1m above the roof eaves or dormer window of the building housing the kitchen), and measures to alleviate noise, vibration, fumes and odours (incorporating active carbon filters, electrostatic precipitators, silencer(s), and</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">antivibration mountings where necessary) shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The system shall be installed in accordance with the approved plans and specifications before the use commences, and shall thereafter be permanently maintained in accordance with the approved plans and specifications.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-23aa61a6-7fff-a8d0-43df-2c94e1a45c90"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that occupiers of neighbouring premises do not suffer a loss of amenity by reason of odour, noise and vibration nuisance from mechanical plants</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Prior to the occupation, the proposed development hereby approved shall achieve Secure by Design accreditation.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-d3dbb5e1-7fff-a89a-a9c7-a898f8c4de48"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To safeguard against potential crime and anti-social behaviour.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">All external lighting shall be in full accordance with the details approved as part of application 2021/3322 dated 24/02/2022.</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-96399af2-7fff-af7d-d97c-cf7ff55c8b2f"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: In order to prevent unnecessary light pollution to the surrounding area, to safeguard amenity, highway safety and biodiversity (in particular to prevent disturbance to bats).</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Details of proposed signage to the community facility shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the space is occupied.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-b3505e37-7fff-25a9-86d0-18209c4bc1f6"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that the external appearance of the building is satisfactory and does not detract from the character and visual amenity of the area or the setting of the conservation area.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Prior to occupation of the development, evidence (including as-built drawings, photographs, post construction surveys) and a final completion statement signed off by an appropriate, qualified, indemnified engineer should be submitted showing that the sustainable drainage system has been constructed as per the approved designs and in accordance with best practice.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-7abec4ad-7fff-b6cf-a77f-8ded4185f89f"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure the satisfactory completion of the SuDs system.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Prior to occupation of any part of the development all of the disabled car parking spaces proposed shall be fitted with active electric vehicle charging points and these shall permanently remain and be maintained for such use.</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-65e447cb-7fff-45ae-bc77-8dec85545d3d"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To promote sustainable modes of transport and reduce pollution, in line with London Plan Policy 6.13</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">The development hereby permitted shall not be occupied until a site travel welcome pack, which encourages the use of alternative modes of transport from the private car, has been submitted to, and approved in writing by, the local planning authority. The Welcome Pack shall be given to all initial occupiers of the development and made available to future occupiers on demand.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: In order to promote sustainable modes of transport.</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-fc21f5f5-7fff-e9ce-8425-4c1e8aed380a"><br></span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Prior to the occupation of the D1 space a management plan shall be submitted to and agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority. Details provided in the management plan shall include, but not be limited to:&nbsp;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">a) Maximum number of patrons&nbsp;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">b) Schedule of activities&nbsp;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">c) Information around noise and management of such.</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-3ab03908-7fff-7526-2d19-8c0e89329531"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure the operation of the D1 space hereby approved does not unacceptable impact neighbouring amenity.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">The cycle storage facilities for the development hereby permitted shall be installed prior to the first occupation of the development hereby approved.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-8fc49a74-7fff-05b0-49c1-17e22ce50b63"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that a reasonable provision is made within the site for the parking of cycles and in the interest of promoting sustainable transport.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Prior to the first occupation of the development a delivery and servicing management plan, including refuse, shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The approved DSMP shall be fully implemented, unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority in consultation with TfL.</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-9e6a6910-7fff-b188-3a33-edca31095834"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that all aspects of the development to which occupiers and /or members of the public will have access are adequately and appropriately managed, maintained and controlled and to minimise any potential impacts on the road network.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">All the landscaping associated with the development shall be in full accordance with the details and samples approved as part of application 2021/3322 dated 24/02/2022. All landscaping in accordance with the scheme shall be carried out within a period of twelve months from the date on which the development of the site commences or shall be carried out in the first planting (and seeding) season following completion of the development, and shall be maintained to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority, on yearly review, for a period of twenty years, such maintenance to include the replacement of any plants that die, or are severely damaged, seriously diseased, or removed with like for like specimens, subject to the agreement of the Local Planning Authority.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-a8f7671a-7fff-2c23-cb4c-a367a027e767"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To accord with the requirements of Section 197(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 and to provide reasonable environmental standards in the interests of the appearance of the site and area.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">The windows, doors, balconies, privacy screening, boundary treatment, canopy and vents shall be in full accordance with the details and samples approved as part of application 2021/1731 dated 24/02/2022.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that the external appearance of the building is satisfactory and </span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 11pt; white-space: pre-wrap;">does not detract from the character and visual amenity of the area.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Materials to be used on the external surfaces of the building, boundary walls and ground surfaces shall be in full accordance with the details approved as part of application 2021/2221 dated 24/02/2022.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-17c17efc-7fff-434c-8da8-712f2a7f5c1b"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that the external appearance of the building is satisfactory and does not detract from the character and visual amenity of the area.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Piling at the site shall be carried out in full accordance with the Pre-Augering Document; Silent Piling Generic Method Statement; Health Safety and Quality Document for Pile Installation dated 19/01/21 by Berryrange; E0689-EEE-00-XX-DR-S-9107 RevP01; E0689-EEE-00-GF-DR-S-1100 RevC01; E0689-EEE-00-B1-DR-S-1099 RevC02.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-f8743c98-7fff-ecab-4aa9-bd53ca6a3f23"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure the protection of identified third party owned water mains and infrastructure beneath the site.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Prior to occupation of the development drainage systems shall be installed at the site in accordance with the: Suds Drainage Strategy Report by Engineeria dated 13/07/2020 (ref: E0689-EEE-00-XX-RP-C-0001 RevP); E0689-EEE-00-XX-DR-C-7099 RevP1; E0689-EEE-00-XX-DR-C-7100 RevP1; E0689-EEE-00-XX-DR-C-7401 RevP1; E0689-EEE-00-XX-DR-C-7402 RevP1; E0689-EEE-00-XX-DR-C-7403 RevP1; Appendix 8 Hackney Suds Proforma. Drainage systems shall be retained and maintained in this condition thereafter.</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-d7c969b4-7fff-83a2-9f74-c8e5db875870"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: The development may lead to sewage flooding; to ensure that sufficient capacity is made available to cope with the new development; and in order to avoid adverse environmental impact upon the community.</span></p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-75afe6a0-7fff-27f4-14b2-c92a4d62d74b"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Removal and appropriate disposal of Invasive Non-Native Species at the site shall be in full accordance with the details approved as part of application 2020/1578 dated 03/06/2020. </span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that the Invasive Non-Native Species are properly removed from the site and to prevent their spread.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Design and construction details of the south western corner of the proposed lower ground floor, access stairs and provision of any hardstanding or parking bays as proposed shall be informed by the intrusive root assessment of the sycamore tree, including appropriate mitigation shall be in full accordance with the details approved as part of application 2020/1578 dated 03/06/20.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-7bc7b96a-7fff-d8ba-e6e0-2322c9912123"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that the carrying out of the approved development does not result in any significant harm to this tree.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Detailed analysis of the location of the roots of the sycamore tree in the neighbouring front garden at 52a Clapton Common shall be in full accordance with the information approved as part of application 2020/1578 dated 03/06/20.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-4bb10029-7fff-77fa-02b0-005f05a8334f"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that the carrying out of the approved development does not result in any significant harm to this tree.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Works of construction shall be in full accordance with the details of tree protection, approved as part of application 2020/1578 dated 03/06/20.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-e2fd4e34-7fff-2418-c86c-4c55b6837f52"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that the carrying out of the approved development does not result in any significant harm to this tree.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Works of construction shall be carried out in full accordance with the Construction Method Statement approved as part of application 2020/1041, dated 24/09/20.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-76e86db0-7fff-c5e8-c5de-2783e36fe817"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To avoid hazard and obstruction being caused to users of the public highway and in the interest of public safety and amenity.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Works of construction shall be carried out in full accordance with the Construction logistics plan approved as part of application 2020/1041, dated 24/09/20.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-bd497775-7fff-777b-1628-1beb01183d16"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To avoid hazard and obstruction being caused to users of the public highway and in the interest of public safety and amenity.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">The description: Minor material amendment to planning permission 2020/4064 dated 23-06-2021 for ‚ÄúVariation of condition application (under S73 of Town and Country Planning Act 1990) to amend condition 2 (approved plans), 3 (Construction logistics plan), 4 (construction management plan), 5 (tree protection), 6 (tree protection), 7 (design of car parking), 8 (removal of invasive species), 11 (piling method statement) and 28 (green / brown roof) of planning permission 2018/0494 dated 25/09/19 for demolition of existing buildings and erection of a 7 storey building comprising a study centre and residential accommodation. Amendments include: change to entrance strategy to the lower ground floor; adjustment to building height; change of apartment floor plan layout‚Äù and as amended by NMA 2022/0936. The proposed changes include the creation of a ground floor women‚Äôs study area to replace two residential units, changes to the ground floor fenestration on each elevation and changes to landscaping, including a basement level water tank below the front set back and removal of fences to the rear.
